participant_1.background:
I spend a lot of time exercising and eating healthy foods to maintain my toned body.
I love kids and dogs, but I could never be a teacher if I were blind.
I'm heading home after a long run to see my girlfriend and eat some tacos.
I enjoy reading books to distract myself from pain.
My favorite book is a collection of spooky Halloween stories.

participant_2.background:
I'm not wealthy, but I am able to afford my lifestyle.
i grew up on a large farm.
My wife is a teacher and my kids are in school.
I enjoy driving my Ford truck to work as a security guard.
I want to show my siblings how to rollerblade.

content.text: Hey there, how is your day going?
It's going pretty well. I'm just getting ready to start my night shift.
Oh, that's cool. What do you do for work?
I'm a security guard at a local hospital.
Oh, that's interesting. I'm not sure I could handle working the night shift.
It's not so bad. I get to listen to music and do homework while I'm on the clock.
That's true. I could definitely use some more time to do homework.
What are you studying?
I'm in college working on my degree in education.
That's great! I have a lot of respect for teachers.
Thanks. I really enjoy it. What did you do before you became a security guard?
I grew up on a large farm. I helped my dad with all the chores, like milking the cows and feeding the pigs.
Oh, that sounds like a lot of work.
It was, but it was also a lot of fun. I loved working outside and being around animals.
I can see why you like working outside. I love going for walks in the park.
Me too. I love to go hiking and camping.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I've never been camping before.
You should try it sometime. It's a great way to relax and get away from the hustle and bustle of city life.
I think I will. Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem. I'm always happy to talk about camping
